text: When I walked in, it wasnâ€™t the typical cocktail bar vibe Iâ€™m used to. It felt more like a spot where people crack open bottles and discuss business deals. ðŸ˜… But hey, two things stood out: first, they have happy hour until 10 PMâ€”two drinks for $30, which is pretty decent. Plus, the alcohol was strong enough to feel like youâ€™re getting your moneyâ€™s worth! Second, they offer unlimited snacks in bags that you can help yourself to. Who needs to order food when you can snack endlessly, right? That said, if youâ€™re feeling peckish, they serve food from the Wine & Chef restaurant next doorâ€”and trust me, their kitchen is solid!

Service by Teri was nice. He made patrons feel welcome with his witty chats.

The place has a relaxing vibe, with soft background music playing that wasnâ€™t too overpowering so that conversations could still take place.

The cocktail was reasonable priced at 2 for $30 during happy hour. Personally I found the drinks to be a little too heavy on the syrup. Could consider making them less sweet so that they would be more enjoyable.

Our first experience at Salud left an indelible mark of satisfaction. From the aptly curated drink selection that perfectly embodied the essence of the establishmentâ€™s name to the captivating interior ambiance, every aspect of our visit was a testament to Saludâ€™s commitment to excellence.

The staff, beyond their roles, exuded genuine warmth and helpfulness, fostering an environment where every guest felt valued. Salud isn't just a place to have a good time; it's a haven for creating cherished memories in the company of cherished friends.

Highly recommended to anyone seeking an exceptional night out. Here's to Salud, where professionalism intertwines seamlessly with fun, leaving patrons appreciative and eagerly anticipating their next visit.

Super chill place, great music great drinks even greater company. Super talented bartender who makes amazing classic cocktails with his own twist (great fashion sense too). They have a self help munchies corner too!

My go to place for cocktail! They have any 2 for $30 from Mon - Thur 6-10 pm.

Terry is great and always like him to make creative drinks for us.

A chill place for drinks and relax.
